# Test Document: Format V2 (Extended)

This format includes full citation details inline (RV Dilation Athletes style).

## Body Text

Athlete's heart is a well-documented phenomenon[1]. The guidelines provide clear recommendations[2].

## References

1. [Athlete's heart and cardiovascular care of the athlete](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26871762/). Sharma S, Merghani A, Mont L. Eur Heart J. 2015;36(21):1285-1294. doi:10.1093/eurheartj/ehv090.
2. [Eligibility and Disqualification Recommendations for Competitive Athletes](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26621644/). Maron BJ, Udelson JE, Bonow RO, et al. Circulation. 2015;132(22):e273-80. doi:10.1161/CIR.0000000000000239.
